text: Salem Mohammed Shafi Al-Dawsari (; born 19 August 1991) is a Saudi Arabian professional Winger football player, he plays Al Hilal in the Saudi Professional League and the Saudi Arabia national football team. ==Club Career== Al-Dawsari joined Villarreal on loan, but he only played 1 match as a substitute against Real Madrid. He played most of his career at Al Hilal. In 7 February 2023, Al Dawsari scored two penalties against Flamengo in the semi- final of the 2022 FIFA Club World Cup. Al Hilal won 3-2, became the first Saudi Arabian club to play in the Club World Cup final. ==International Career== Al-Dawsari scored his first international goal against Australia in 2014 FIFA World Cup qualifiers In May 2018, he was confirmed in the Saudi Arabia's initial Squad for the Russian 2018 FIFA World Cup On 23 June 2018, he scored late penalty against Egypt, he won the last group stage matches in the Russian 2018 FIFA World Cup On 23 November 2022, Al-Dawsari scored his second goal against Argentina and the result was 2-1 beat Argentina in the 2022 FIFA World Cup match. On 30 November 2022, he scored his goal against Mexico and resulted in a 2-1 defeat by Mexico in the 2022 FIFA World Cup matches. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National cup National cup League cup League cup Continental Continental Other Other Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Al Hilal 2011–12 Saudi Professional League 13 2 4 1 4 0 7 1 — — 28 4 Al Hilal 2012–13 Saudi Professional League 18 3 1 0 2 0 8 2 — — 29 5 Al Hilal 2013–14 Saudi Professional League 21 4 3 0 4 1 8 2 — — 36 7 Al Hilal 2014–15 Saudi Professional League 18 3 2 1 3 0 10 0 — — 33 4 Al Hilal 2015–16 Saudi Professional League 14 3 2 0 2 0 11 1 0 0 29 4 Al Hilal 2016–17 Saudi Professional League 17 2 4 2 2 0 5 1 1 0 29 5 Al Hilal 2017–18 Saudi Professional League 13 4 0 0 — — 6 0 — — 19 4 Al Hilal 2018–19 Saudi Professional League 23 5 1 0 — — 2 0 11 0 37 5 Al Hilal 2019–20 Saudi Professional League 20 4 3 1 — — 12 3 3 1 38 9 Al Hilal 2020–21 Saudi Professional League 24 8 1 0 — — 2 0 1 0 28 8 Al Hilal 2021–22 Saudi Professional League 22 9 2 2 – – 8 5 4 2 36 18 Al Hilal 2022–23 Saudi Professional League 14 4 2 0 — — 4 2 4 2 24 8 Al Hilal 2023–24 Saudi Professional League 27 14 3 0 — — 10 6 8 4 48 24 Al Hilal 2024–25 Saudi Professional League 7 3 1 0 — — 3 4 2 0 13 7 Al Hilal Total Total 251 68 29 7 17 1 96 27 34 9 427 112 Villarreal (loan) 2017–18 La Liga 1 0 — — — — — — — — 1 0 Career total Career total Career total 252 68 29 7 17 1 96 27 34 9 428 112 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Saudi Arabia 2012 2 1 2013 7 0 2014 9 1 2015 4 0 2016 0 0 2017 5 2 2018 14 3 2019 9 4 2020 1 1 2021 8 4 2022 13 3 2023 6 3 2024 12 1 Total 90 23 :Saudi Arabia score listed first, score after each Al-Dawsari goal.
